co.cask.cdap.client

Class ProgramClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.cdap.client.ProgramClient

  • @Beta
public class ProgramClient
extends Object
    Provides ways to interact with CDAP Programs.

      • start

        @Deprecated
public void start(co.cask.cdap.proto.Id.Program program,
                    boolean debug,
                    @Nullable
                    Map<String,String> runtimeArgs)
           throws IOException,
                  co.cask.cdap.common.ProgramNotFoundException,
                  co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException,
                  co.cask.cdap.security.spi.authorization.UnauthorizedException
        Deprecated. since 4.0.0. Please use start(ProgramId, boolean, Map) instead
        Starts a program using specified runtime arguments.
        Parameters:
        program - the program to start
        debug - true to start in debug mode
        runtimeArgs - runtime arguments to pass to the program
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occurred
        co.cask.cdap.common.ProgramNotFoundException - if the program with the specified name could not be found
        co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException - if the request is not authorized successfully in the gateway server
        co.cask.cdap.security.spi.authorization.UnauthorizedException

      • waitForStatus

        @Deprecated
public void waitForStatus(co.cask.cdap.proto.Id.Program program,
                            String status,
                            long timeout,
                            TimeUnit timeoutUnit)
                   throws co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException,
                          IOException,
                          co.cask.cdap.common.ProgramNotFoundException,
                          TimeoutException,
                          InterruptedException
        Deprecated. since 4.0.0. Please use waitForStatus(ProgramId, ProgramStatus, long, TimeUnit) instead
        Waits for a program to have a certain status.
        Parameters:
        program - the program
        status - the desired status
        timeout - how long to wait in milliseconds until timing out
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occurred
        co.cask.cdap.common.ProgramNotFoundException - if the program with the specified name could not be found
        co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException - if the request is not authorized successfully in the gateway server
        TimeoutException - if the program did not achieve the desired program status before the timeout
        InterruptedException - if interrupted while waiting for the desired program status

      • waitForStatus

        public void waitForStatus(co.cask.cdap.proto.id.ProgramId program,
                 co.cask.cdap.proto.ProgramStatus status,
                 long timeout,
                 TimeUnit timeoutUnit)
                   throws co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException,
                          IOException,
                          co.cask.cdap.common.ProgramNotFoundException,
                          TimeoutException,
                          InterruptedException
        Waits for a program to have a certain status.
        Parameters:
        program - the program
        status - the desired status
        timeout - how long to wait in milliseconds until timing out
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occurred
        co.cask.cdap.common.ProgramNotFoundException - if the program with the specified name could not be found
        co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException - if the request is not authorized successfully in the gateway server
        TimeoutException - if the program did not achieve the desired program status before the timeout
        InterruptedException - if interrupted while waiting for the desired program status

      • getLiveInfo

        @Deprecated
public co.cask.cdap.proto.DistributedProgramLiveInfo getLiveInfo(co.cask.cdap.proto.Id.Program program)
                                                          throws IOException,
                                                                 co.cask.cdap.common.ProgramNotFoundException,
                                                                 co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException,
                                                                 co.cask.cdap.security.spi.authorization.UnauthorizedException
        Deprecated. since 4.0.0. Use getLiveInfo(ProgramId) instead
        Gets the live information of a program. In distributed CDAP, this will contain IDs of the YARN applications that are running the program.
        Parameters:
        program - the program
        Returns:
        ProgramLiveInfo of the program
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occurred
        co.cask.cdap.common.ProgramNotFoundException - if the program with the specified name could not be found
        co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException - if the request is not authorized successfully in the gateway server
        co.cask.cdap.security.spi.authorization.UnauthorizedException
